TextBlock.Text: BRIDGE: Day 3 of the investigation is underway. The atmosphere is getting a bit tense. And cold.
BRIDGE: Today had the biggest scare yet... prying open a shed door to reveal a pile of frozen corpses.

BRIDGE: While I was vomiting, Reson and Fret stepped inside for a closer look. They walked out with something peculiar: A banjo. I acknowledge that a banjo, by itself, is not peculiar. However this banjo was undamaged.
BRIDGE: Reson and Fret got into a disagreement about what they should do with it. The conversation grew loud, so Rim and I have stepped away.
BRIDGE: Rim says it's healthy for a team to have disagreement, but I disagree.
BRIDGE: Reson has that look in his eye... I think he's plotting something.
